markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 8"
    pfs="Limited"
>
[Practiced Guidance](/Feats.aspx?ID=931) <actions string="" />
</title>

<spoilers>May contain spoilers from Age of Ashes</spoilers>

<traits>
<trait label="Uncommon" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=159" />
<trait label="Archetype" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=12" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Pathfinder #147: Tomorrow Must Burn](/Sources.aspx?ID=8) pg. 75</row>

**Archetype** [Bellflower Tiller](/Archetypes.aspx?ID=23)

**Prerequisites**
[Bellflower Dedication](/Feats.aspx?ID=928)

</column>

---

Making one’s way to safety can be harrowing, but you have extensive practice at helping others along that path. When you roll a success to [Aid](/Actions.aspx?ID=75) a member of your crop, you get a critical success instead.
name: Practiced Guidance

text: <title level="1" right="Feat 8" pfs="Limited" > Practiced Guidance May contain spoilers from Age of Ashes Source Pathfinder #147: Tomorrow Must Burn pg. 75 Archetype Bellflower Tiller Prerequisites Bellflower Dedication --- Making one’s way to safety can be harrowing, but you have extensive practice at helping others along that path. When you roll a success to Aid a member of your crop, you get a critical success instead.
